Dear Cantera Users,


         I am trying to build a 64 bit version of Cantera on my SGI.  Right 
now, I am stuck on trying to build a 64 bit version of Python.  Can anybody 
send me the flags they use to build python on an SGI (using a 64 bit build)?

Thanks,
Tony
